title: How many games do you play in a day?
body: Just keen on knowing how many games my fellow summoners play in a day.

replies.body: 2-3 games a day, I spend more time watching replays or streams
Some it really depends if I feel like it or not
woah I got the first vote for 1hr...but really on regular week days I play 20-40 minutes. so....
Depends, weekends i play 6+ hours, during work days i only play 2-3 hours.
Usually 1-5 games per day, at the moment none.
Been playing 10-12 games a day and losing them all, it blows
